help:
available commands are:
  • subscribe <repo>
  • unsubscribe <repo>
  • list
Use only the repo name, omitting the owner (e.g. repo instead of myorg/repo).
list_empty: This chat is not subscribed to any repositories.
subscribe: Successfully subscribed to updates on <%= organization %>/<%= repo %>.
unrecognized: I didn't catch that. Try the help command to learn how to use me!
unsubscribe: Successfully unsubscribed from updates for <%= organization %>/<%= repo %>.
unsubscribe_fail: This chat is not subscribed to <%= repo %>.
